overview: Mairis Briedis - son, father, husband, a Latvian. World boxing champion. From the producers of "Looking for Mr. Dice" comes a new documentary that sheds light on a personal life of the famous boxer. Through unique, previously unseen footage and interviews with persons closest to him we'll get to know another, more intimate side of Mairis Briedis while he trains for his carreer's greatest fight.
title: Mairis Briedis: Life as a Fight
